'''Muzhen''' {{Lang|zh=慕珍|zh_rm=Mùzhēn}} is an event-exclusive [[NPC]] that appeared in [[Thunder Sojourn]]. As [[The Crux]]'s Chief Technical Officer, she holds a great deal of interest in [[Ruin Machines]] and how they operate.
